bio: Chris Miller is a Senior R&D Engineer for Tyler Technologies currently working with web services using ASP.NET MVC and mobile development using Xamarin Studio. He is newly minted Microsoft MVP for Visual Studion and is a Xamarin Certified Mobile Developer. He's @[Anotherlab](https://twitter.com/anotherlab) on Twitter and blogs at [http://anotherlab.rajapet.net/](http://anotherlab.rajapet.net/).
